1.1.2.1.5. shapepipe.pipeline.file_handler module¶

FILE HANDLER

This module defines a class for handling pipeline files.

Author:Samuel Farrens <samuel.farrens@cea.fr>
shapepipe.pipeline.file_handler.find_files(path, pattern='*', ext='*')[source]¶

Find Files

This method recursively retrieves file names from a given path that match a given pattern and/or have a given extension.

Parameters:
  • path (str) – Full path to files
  • pattern (str, optional) – File pattern, default is ‘*’
  • ext (str, optional) – File extension, default is ‘*’
Returns:

List of file names
Return type:

list
Raises:
  • ValueError – For ‘*’ in pattern
  • ValueError – For ‘*’ in extension
  • ValueError – For invalid extension format
  • RuntimeError – For empty file list
class shapepipe.pipeline.file_handler.FileHandler(run_name, modules, config)[source]¶

Bases: object

File Handler

This class manages the files used and produced during a pipeline run.

Parameters:
  • run_name (str) – Run name
  • module_list (list) – List of modules to be run
  • config (CustomParser) – Configuaration parser instance

This method defines the run directory.

Format Path Name

  • ext (str, optional) – File extension, default is ‘’

static _one_pattern_per_dir(dir_list, pattern_list, ext_list)[source]¶

One Pattern Per Directory

Find module files assuming one file pattern per input directory.

Parameters:
  • dir_list (list) – List of input directories
  • pattern_list (list) – List of file patterns
  • ext_list (list) – List of file extensions
Returns:

List of input files
Return type:

list
static _all_pattern_per_dir(dir_list, pattern_list, ext_list)[source]¶

All Patterns Per Directory

Find module files assuming all file patterns are applied to all input directories.

  • pattern_list (list) – List of file patterns
  • ext_list (list) – List of file extensions
